defcon_stack.cli_template:
Prereq: Install tools via Dashboard > Tools (nmap, nuclei, sqlmap) or system package manager.

nmap --version
nmap -sV -p 1-1000 <target>

nuclei -version
nuclei -u <url> -severity medium,high,critical

sqlmap --version
sqlmap -u <url> --batch --risk=1 --level=1

offsec_suite.cli_template:
Prereq: Install tools via Dashboard > Tools (metasploit, hydra).

msfconsole -v
# inside msfconsole
# search <module>
# use <module>
# show options
# set RHOSTS <target>
# run

hydra -h
hydra -L <userlist> -P <passlist> <target> ssh

osint_suite.cli_template:
Prereq: Install tools via Dashboard > Tools (amass, theharvester).

amass enum -d <domain>

theHarvester -d <domain> -b all

sigint_suite.cli_template:
Prereq: Install tools via Dashboard > Tools (rtl_433, gnuradio).

rtl_433 -V
# run with your SDR device
rtl_433 -f <freq>

gnuradio-companion --version

networking_suite.cli_template:
Prereq: Install tools via Dashboard > Tools (nmap, masscan, traceroute).

nmap --version
nmap -sV <target>

masscan --version
masscan <target> -p1-65535 --rate 1000

traceroute <target>

analysis_suite.cli_template:
Prereq: Install tools via Dashboard > Tools (tshark, wireshark).

tshark -v
# capture to file
# tshark -i <iface> -w capture.pcapng

wireshark --version

vuln_scanning.cli_template:
Prereq: Install tools via Dashboard > Tools (nuclei, nikto).

nuclei -version
nuclei -u <url>

nikto -Version
nikto -h <url>

web_enum.cli_template:
Prereq: Install tools via Dashboard > Tools (httpx, ffuf, feroxbuster).

httpx -version
httpx -l <targets.txt>

ffuf -h
ffuf -u https://<host>/FUZZ -w <wordlist>

feroxbuster -V
feroxbuster -u https://<host>

recon_suite.cli_template:
Prereq: Install tools via Dashboard > Tools (subfinder, amass, assetfinder).

subfinder -version
subfinder -d <domain>

amass enum -d <domain>

assetfinder --help
assetfinder <domain>

credential_audit.cli_template:
Prereq: Install tools via Dashboard > Tools (hashcat, john).

hashcat --version
hashcat -m <hash_type> -a 0 <hashes.txt> <wordlist>

john --version
john --wordlist=<wordlist> <hashes.txt>

packet_capture.cli_template:
Prereq: Install tools via Dashboard > Tools (tcpdump).

tcpdump --version
sudo tcpdump -i <iface> -w capture.pcap

malware_analysis.cli_template:
Prereq: Install tools via Dashboard > Tools (radare2, yara).

r2 -v
r2 <sample.bin>

yara --version
yara -r <rules.yar> <sample_dir>

forensics_suite.cli_template:
Prereq: Install tools via Dashboard > Tools (volatility3).

vol -h
vol -f <memory.img> windows.info

red_team_ops.cli_template:
Prereq: Install tools via Dashboard > Tools (impacket, crackmapexec).

impacket-GetUserSPNs -h
impacket-GetUserSPNs <domain>/<user>:<pass> -dc-ip <dc_ip>

crackmapexec --version
crackmapexec smb <target> -u <user> -p <pass>
